overview: Memorable - Grace Hartley and Jenny Delugo A flirty dinner for two escalates quickly into a full-blown make out session.Eat You Up - Whitney and Xenia Shared chocolates take on a sensual overtone as the girls share the sweets and kisses. For Your Love - Noleta and Sicilia These Russian hotties can't keep their mouths and hands off of each other as they enjoy the warmth of the sun. Exposed - Denisa Heaven and Grace Hartley Standing outdoors wearing nothing but panties, Denisa and Grace exchange kisses as their hands wonder over each other's slender bodies. Friends with Benefits - Cayla and Mindy Bent on seduction, Mindy approaches her friend Cayla from behind and gives her a lingering kiss.
title: Exposed
